title: Axiom Pattern Schema
description: Schema for Layer 0 axioms that form the logical foundation of agent systems

statement.description: The axiom statement - a self-evident truth that requires no proof

rationale.description: Why this axiom is foundational and necessary

derivations.description: Practical rules that derive from this axiom

category.description: Core axioms are always included; optional axioms are domain-customizable

use_when.description: For optional axioms: conditions when this axiom should be selected

conflicts_with.description: List of axiom IDs that may conflict with this one

examples.statement: All agent outputs must be verifiable against source
